text: tumhen kya hua hai ki munaafiqon (dvidhaavaadiyon) ke baare mein do paksh[1] ban gaye ho, jabaki allaah ne unake kukarmon ke kaaran unhen ondha kar diya hai. kya tum use supath darsha dena chaahate ho, jise allaah ne kupath kar diya ho? aur jise allaah kupath kar de, to tum usake lie koee raah nahin pa sakate
